markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Cloudkill](/Spells.aspx?ID=42)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Death" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=40" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 324 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodline**
[Undead](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=10)

**Deities**
[Apollyon](/Deities.aspx?ID=390), [Cixyron](/Deities.aspx?ID=417), [Isph-Aun-Vuln](/Deities.aspx?ID=583), [Nergal](/Deities.aspx?ID=529), [Nhimbaloth](/Deities.aspx?ID=572), [Sicva](/Deities.aspx?ID=411), [Vorasha](/Deities.aspx?ID=422), [Ydersius](/Deities.aspx?ID=323)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You conjure a poisonous fog. This functions as [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), except the area moves 10 feet away from you each round. You deal 6d8 poison damage to each breathing creature that starts its turn in the spell's area. You can Dismiss the spell.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d8.
name: Cloudkill

summary: Poison creatures in a cloud that moves away from you.
summary_markdown: Poison creatures in a cloud that moves away from you.
text: Cloudkill Three Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 324 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Bloodline Undead Deities Apollyon, Cixyron, Isph-Aun-Vuln, Nergal, Nhimbaloth, Sicva, Vorasha, Ydersius Cast material, somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area 20-foot burst Saving Throw basic Fortitude Duration 1 minute --- You conjure a poisonous fog. This functions as obscuring mist , except the area moves 10 feet away from you each round. You deal 6d8 poison damage to each breathing creature that starts its turn in the spell's area. You can Dismiss the spell. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.
